secondaries.shortDescription: Score 1 everytime an enemy model flees the battle field. When enemy unit is destroyed , roll 2D6, if higher than leadership +1VP

subObjectives.description: You rolled 2D6 with higher Leadership than the enemy unit destroyed by a LEGIONES DAEMONICA

secondaries.shortDescription: Score points depending if your Chaos Deamons are within quarters or central to the battlefield

subObjectives.description: each table quarter that has one or more LEGIONES DAEMONICA wholly within it and not within 6'' of the center of the battlefield, provided your opponent does not have more units wholly within the same table quarter
Score 1 victory point if one or more LEGIONES DAEMONICA units are wholly within 6'' of the centre of the battlefield.

secondaries.shortDescription: LEGIONES DAEMONICA INFANTRY can attempt Dark Ritual (end of movement phase up to next command phase)

subObjectives.description: A unit from your army completed the action
